name: combo_a
description:
Combines multiple alpha signals into a single weighted output by balancing each alpha's historical return with its variability over the most recent nlength days.

The parameter mode selects one of the several weighted approaches (algo1, algo2, algo3), each of which handles the tradeoff between performance and stability differently.

name: group_backfill
description: If a certain value for a certain date and instrument is NaN, from the set of same group instruments, calculate winsorized mean of all non-NaN values over last d days

name: group_cartesian_product
description: Merge two groups into one group. If originally there are len_1 and len_2 group indices in g1 and g2, there will be len_1 * len_2 indices in the new group.

name: group_mean
description: All elements in group equals to the mean

name: group_median
description: All elements in group equals to the median value of the group.

name: group_neutralize
description: Neutralizes Alpha against groups. These groups can be subindustry, industry, sector, country or a constant

name: group_normalize
description: Normalizes input such that each group's absolute sum is 1

name: group_rank
description: Each elements in a group is assigned the corresponding rank in this group

name: group_scale
description: Normalizes the values in a group to be between 0 and 1. (x - groupmin) / (groupmax - groupmin)

name: group_zscore
description:
Calculates group Z-score - numerical measurement that describes a value's relationship to the mean of a group of values. Z-score is measured in terms of standard deviations from the mean. zscore = (data - mean) / stddev of x for each instrument within its group.

Input: Value of 5 instruments of Group A: (100, 0, 50, 60, 25)
Output: (1.57, -1.39, 0.09, 0.39, -0.65)
